DOC.criteria: Be legal age consent sign Informed Consent document . Normal binocularity . Be able wear soft contact lens . Willing comply wear study visit schedule . Spherical contact lens prescription within 0.50 diopter available lens power . Spectacle cylinder less equal 1.50 diopter . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury surgery within twelve week enrollment . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Currently enrol clinical trial . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution determine investigator . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
